title: hard reset idea for season 7
body: was just curious to see what would people think of a hard reset for 2017 since s6 was easy to boost friends and what not i think it would be ideal to do a hard MMR reset for solo que to filter out all the people who got ranks they obviously didnt deserve. just a thought, plz no flamerino.

replies.body:
100% agree.

Hard reset solo/duo

Keep MMR for Flex (since it is dynamic que anyway)
Did you not see the outburst of people blowing up about being matched with high elo players in flex q, it would take months to filter out the good from the average
